Comment: In the immediate term, domestic producers will raise prices to match the import prices and keep the new increase as profit. When people stop buying altogether, the markets crash, and the prices of everything drops. Most people won‚Äôt have the money to take advantage of this, but all of the wealthy people who managed to make a profit in the previous step now have mounds of cash to buy everything back up. Supply goes waaay back down, and prices go back up again. Think about how PE started buying houses during COVID and then the prices of homes started doubling, tripling, and quadrupling over a few years compared to their pre-2020 prices. Same thing will happen here. At least, this is my guess.
